bib.title: Cross sections and isomer ratios in the Rb(n,g) and Sr(n,g) reactions

free_txt: The samples were irradiated in the
Oregon State University TRIGA reactor
Compiled by S.H.
HPGe detector with volume of 169 cm3 and
efficiency of 35% compared with NaI at 1332 keV.
Detector resolution was 1.68 keV at 1332 keV.
The samples were irradiated in the
Oregon State University TRIGA reactor
Four different irradiation stations were used
in this experiment
Site                        Thermal  epith.flux
n/cm2/s    n/cm2/s
1. Pneumatic transport           7.2E+12    3.4E+11
2. Thermal column                7.8.E+10   2.E+8
3. Cd lined site in central core 0          1.2E+12
4. Two sites in outer core       4.5E+12    3.6E+11

transport system
Recommended value
Dilute (0.134%) alloys of Au in aluminum metal foils
Thin RbCl sample with purity of 99.8%, sandwiched
between two layers of transparent tape to form an
approximate disk of radius 3 - 4 mm and average
thickness 0.1 - 0.2 mm
Data taken from tab. 2 of the reference
